name: Mercenary Hireling
dailyCost: 2 gp (minimum, varies by skill and danger)
description: A mercenary is a combat-capable hireling who fights for pay. Their daily rate varies depending on their skill, the danger involved, and market conditions. Mercenaries expect a share of loot in addition to their daily wage and will leave if payment is withheld or if the danger far exceeds what they agreed to.
capabilities: Proficient with martial weapons and medium armor
Will engage in combat as directed
Follows tactical orders from their employer
Expects hazard pay for especially dangerous missions
May negotiate for a share of treasure (typically 1/2 share)

examples.description: Basic security, watches, and escort duty
Elite protection, willing to put their life on the line
